appDescription.message: Coupert automatically finds coupons, applies best coupon code at checkout & gives you cashback.

store_how_work_hover.message:
Get rewarded for stuff that you're already buying with Coupert Gold! Merchants give us a small commission for bringing them business, and we directly share it with you through our free Coupert Gold rewards program. And Coupert Gold will be added into your account automatically when we are informed about the transaction, but the action dose not take place in real time. Before placing your order, please confirm that Coupert is the only or last cash back program you have activated.
Learn more

need_it_tips.message: some restrictions apply You can receive 20 Gold as a reward by submitting retail sites you need. The maximum is 60 Gold per week. If the submitted site does not meet the conditions, the Gold may be cancelled. *100 Gold=$1, can be redeemed via PayPal.

auto_test_title.message:
Tired of copying? Report us to add Auto-Test
  • Just a single click, Coupert finds and tests all coupons in seconds, and applies the best working coupons.
  • If there isn't any active savings for your cart, that means you already have the lowest price.
  • When you meet a "Apply Coupons" button, just click it.
  • So far, you can use this magic at over 8,000 stores all over the world.
 for this store.
